venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
6:30 - Socializing and pizza (provided by Microsoft)

7:00 - Demos Start The next big version of Eclipse (Indigo) will be released at the end of June. To celebrate the release we are organizing a DemoCamp so that you can see a showcase of all of the cool technology being built by the Eclipse community and have a chance to meet other Eclipse enthusiasts in Boston. Come see quick demos of the upcoming features, the cool new Orion project, as well as tooling from Architexa, JBoss, and the i2b2 project from Partners Healthcare, the WindowsBuilder project from Google and the Apricot project from Nuxeo. We will have some of the core developers around and you will be able to hear our thoughts on the future of everything Eclipse related.
item.name: Eclipse Demo Day
